alert.note: Alert for Arthur; Grant; Hooker; McPherson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 14 at 7:04AM CDT until July 14 at 7:45AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Arthur County in west central Nebraska... Eastern Grant County in west central Nebraska... Southwestern Hooker County in west central Nebraska... Northwestern McPherson County in west central Nebraska... * Until 745 AM CDT/645 AM MDT/. * At 703 AM CDT/603 AM MDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located near Whitman, or 24 miles west of Mullen, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Swan Lake, Whitman, Carr Lake, Sand Beach Lake, Big Lamunyon Flats, Cogill Lake and East Cody Lake. This includes Highway 2 between mile markers 157 and 165. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
